body:
Comment 17 by **qeed.quan**: 
hi here is the exe compiled with the code described above. I also uploaded the dll in
case you guys need it to run. all of this was built using mingw_x86_64 using gcc 4.7
Attachments: 1. SDL.dll (1737832 bytes) 1. glew32.dll (494407 bytes) 1. sdl-cgo.exe (1348608 bytes)
